name: WUSM Assign DAG
description: A module to assign DAGs for multisite public surveys. Append the query string &dag=YOUR_DAG_UNIQUE_NAME to the end of the URL i.e. https://redcapURL/surveys/index.php?s=84MY9NREFJ&dag=YOUR_DAG_UNIQUE_NAME To make the links easier to share, you may wish to use a URL shortener like goo.gl

authors.name: Sairam Sutari
authors.institution: Washington University School of Medicine Institute for Informatics
